name: Pawball
summary: Pawball is a Cat vs Cat VR Soccer Game. Use your hands to run, climb, jump and "kick" the ball in this free-to-play multiplayer game developed by the creators of the Pixel Ripped franchise ARVORE Immersive Experiences
